TopicTitle: A mod for better parts organisation?

Articles.Content:
I could really use suggestion about a mod for better parts organisation. For example, I'm quite annoyed by TAC Life support parts displayed both in "Utility" and it's own "Life support" category ect. 

Designing new ships is getting more and more tedious with increased parts number. I'm pretty much sure you guys know what I'm talking about...

Any suggestions? 

Thanks...

Vecko

Edit: I've found one of the possible solutions but I'm still opened for more suggestions...

 

Edited May 3, 2017 by vdr1981

You'll probably want to start here:

Though note it basically doubles-down on the parts in multiple categories - it allows you to create your own categories, and by default will have multiple overlapping categories.  It makes it easier - IMHO - because you can find a part whichever way you think of it.
Can't you make your own categories stock?
